rawText:
({
  basePath,
  callback,
  fileName,
  folderName,
  shell = true,
}: Omit<AllInputType, "type" | "command">) =>
  forAllFolders({
    type: "operations",
    fileName,
    folderName,
    callback,
    basePath,
    command: "npm run pub --if-present",
    shell,
  })
name: publishAllOperations
description: Script to publish all packages everywhere (that also runs prepublish). Only src in git, only build in npm.
